title: John finds out that jessica is engaged (Person of Interest) ( 1 x 3 )
author: Person of Interest Clips
comment: The Series is now 10 Jears old I love it ❤
description: This is an scene from season 1 episode 3 where john runs into jessica at the airport and finds out that she is engaged. Lesson learned. If you are interested in someone, take the risk and tell them before it is too late.
